aboutCompany.heading: About Innolease
texts: Innolease is an experienced and agile leasing partner that offers customer-focused and flexible solutions for business needs. As part of the Autolle.com Group, we specialize in machinery, equipment, and vehicle leasing solutions with our strong team's years of experience in business financing and leasing.

We've grown rapidly by combining rental and leasing services into one comprehensive entity. Our goal is to offer customers the most comprehensive and flexible solutions that meet the changing needs of today's businesses and individuals.
With 800+ vehicles nationwide and digital tools like InnoFleet Manager, we empower Finnish businesses to manage mobility with cost-efficiency, clarity, and scalability.

positions.title: Senior Leasing Specialist
texts: Lead complex leasing negotiations and develop tailored solutions for large corporate clients. Requires 5+ years experience in business financing or leasing.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business, or related field
5+ years experience in leasing or business financing

positions.title: Customer Service Representative
texts: Provide exceptional customer support to our leasing clients. Handle inquiries, coordinate maintenance services, and ensure customer satisfaction.
requirements: Experience in customer service or related field

positions.title: Digital Product Manager
texts: Drive the development of our InnoFleet Manager platform and other digital services. Lead product strategy and work with development teams.
requirements: Product management experience in SaaS or fintech

positions.title: Fleet Coordinator
texts: Manage vehicle logistics, coordinate maintenance schedules, and ensure optimal fleet utilization. Work closely with clients and service partners.
requirements: Experience in logistics or fleet management
Ability to work with multiple stakeholders

positions.title: Business Development Trainee
texts: 12-month trainee program covering all aspects of business leasing. Perfect opportunity for recent graduates to start their career in the leasing industry.
requirements: Interest in business finance and customer service
Ambition to grow in the leasing industry

howToApply.heading: How to Apply
texts: Ready to join our team? We'd love to hear from you! Send us your application including your CV and a cover letter explaining why you're interested in the position and what you can bring to our team.
All applications are treated confidentially, and we'll get back to you within two weeks. If you have questions about any position, don't hesitate to contact us.
requirements: Submit your CV in PDF format
Specify which position you're applying for
Include your availability and salary expectations
